fullplot: Set in a near-future, militarized world marked by closed borders, virtual labor and a global digital network that joins minds and experiences, three strangers risk their lives to connect with each other and break the barriers of technology.
plot: The near future. Like tomorrow. In a world marked by closed borders, corporate warriors, and a global computer network, three strangers risk their lives to connect, break through the barriers of technology, and unseal their fates.
title: Sleep Dealer

tomatoes.consensus: Sleep Dealer's depth and energy are almost enough to overcome a shaky screenplay and pedestrian acting.
